attributes.additional_details: Channel 4 provides a wide variety of  programmes not found on other channels due to its mandate, these programmes are at risk if not mandated. C4 also provides a large free streaming service which is at risk if the channel is sold to profit making enterprise.
attributes.background: Channel 4 should remain publicly funded and continue to work to its mandate

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613995
